name: Static Wave
details:
Saint Marie Records Limited Edition Reverb/Fuzz Pedal"The first Saint Marie Records specially manufactured guitar pedal. Featuring two of the effects that make Shoegaze/Dreampop great. Reverb on one side and Fuzz on the other. Use them separate or together. The pedal includes many features allowing you to sculpt your sound."
~ Saint Marie Records

http://www.saintmarierecords.com/products/587203-static-waves-pedal-reverb-fuzz
